org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.input

Interface FileInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Input, Serializable

    public interface FileInput
extends Input
    Input that allows you to perform file operations that would otherwise be prohibited by the sandbox security manager.
    It features easy ways to read different types of files

    • Method Summary

      java.util.Optional<byte[]> getBinaryFile(java.lang.String pathInResources)

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getFile(java.lang.String pathInResources)
        Load a text file and return the content as string
        Parameters:
        pathInResources - the relative path to the file in the data folder
        Returns:
        the content of the file or an empty optional if the operation failed

      • getImage

        java.util.Optional<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> getImage(java.lang.String pathInResources)
        Load an image from a file and return it as BufferedImage
        Parameters:
        pathInResources - the relative path to the file in the data folder
        Returns:
        the image or an empty optional if the operation failed

      • getBinaryFile

        java.util.Optional<byte[]> getBinaryFile(java.lang.String pathInResources)
        Load any file into a byte array
        Parameters:
        pathInResources - the relative path to the file in the data folder
        Returns:
        a byte array that contains all data from the file or an empty optional if the operation failed
